page.title: 04FARMING IN FORFAR
page.content: The{Market}of Forfar is situated behind the ground of Forfar Athletic Football Club,our home team.The market sells pigs,beef cattle,dairy cattle and you can buy sheep as well.{Crops.} Most of the farms around Forfar plant grain,turnips,seed potatoes like Desiree and ware potatoes like Records and King Edward.The farms around Forfar export potatoes to Egypt and Algeria. Some of the farms are called Hatton of Carse,Heatherstacks,Bogside, North Mains,Carsebank and Benzil. The{Land}of Forfar is very good for oil seed rape and barley.The grazing around Forfar is fine.The milking cattle are really good for cheese,milk and butter.The north area of Forfar is really good agricultural land.The Strathmore Valley has very rich soil for farming, lying between the Sidlaw Hills and the Grampian Mts.
